remarks: Part of proof that isomorphism H is order-preserving .  (Contributed by NM, 6-Apr-2014.)
statement:
dihmeetlem5.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dihmeetlem5.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dihmeetlem5.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
dihmeetlem5.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
dihmeetlem5.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
dihmeetlem5 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ Q .<_ X ) ) -> ( X ./\ ( Y .\/ Q ) ) = ( ( X ./\ Y ) .\/ Q ) ) $.
